## We Love Your Ideas!

Thank you for thinking about how to make Expert Mentor better. We welcome feature suggestions from our community and appreciate you taking the time to share your thoughts. Every great feature starts with someone saying "wouldn't it be cool if..."

---

## What Feature Would You Like to See?

Please describe the feature you have in mind. What would it do? How would it work?

---

## What Problem Would This Solve?

Help us understand the value this feature would provide.

**Think about it this way:**
- As a [type of user, e.g., developer, project manager, student]
- I want [what this feature does]
- So that [the benefit or problem it solves]

**Example:**
> "As a developer, I want one-click deployment, so that I can ship features faster without worrying about configuration."

---

## How Do You Imagine This Working?

Share your vision for how this feature might work. Don't worry about technical details â€” we're interested in your perspective as a user.

Things to consider:
- How would you access this feature?
- What would the experience feel like?
- Are there similar features in other tools you like?

---

## Anything Else That Might Help?

Feel free to share any additional context:

- Mockups or diagrams (even rough sketches are great!)
- Examples from other tools
- Use cases or scenarios
- Any thoughts on implementation

---

## How Would This Improve Expert Mentor?

This helps us prioritize and understand the impact:

- [ ] Better user experience
- [ ] New functionality that's currently missing
- [ ] Performance improvements
- [ ] Enhanced security or privacy
- [ ] Other (please describe)

---

## What Alternatives Have You Considered?

Have you explored other ways to solve this problem? Sharing what you've already tried or considered helps us understand your needs better.

---

## Thank You for Contributing!

Your ideas help shape the future of Expert Mentor. We review all feature requests and appreciate you taking the time to make the project better for everyone. We'll respond as soon as we can to discuss your suggestion.
